page.title: 11An adults life in Stithians
page.content: Our school caretaker, married with two daughters and a son, has lived in{Stithians}all his life. As a child he knew everyone in the village, but now there are so many outsiders he does not know everyone. However he likes meeting people at work. Like many people {in Stithians,}our caretaker gets up at about 7:15am. First he takes his daughter to Redruth where she works as a receptionist and his wife down to {Ponsanooth}where she works with computers at a civil engineering company. Then he takes his youngest daughter to Stithians school. He keeps pigeons for a hobby and he puts them into races from as far away as Luxembourg. He sometimes goes into the pub, The Seven Stars, while he waits to lock up the{school after a meeting or a practice.
